summary: Google is a powerful American company founded in 1998 by Larry Page and Sergey Brin. It offers many products like search, email, maps, and AI. Its parent company is Alphabet Inc., and it is one of the Big Tech companies. Google has a strong market presence and offers products like Gmail, Chrome, YouTube, and Android. It has faced criticism for privacy and monopoly concerns. As of 2024, a court ruled that Google held an illegal monopoly in internet search.
title: Google
